title: BACnetEventCallback (Method)
text:
METHOD BACnetEventCallback : BOOL
This method gets called, whenever a event occurs for which the implementing FB is registered via
BACnetServer.RegisterHook
or
BACnetServer.RegisterCallback
. Since several FBs implementing IBACnetEventConsumer can be registered for one event or callback the
following rules are used for the returned BOOL:
If the method returns FALSE, all other registered IBACnetEventConsumer objects for the specified Hook/Callback are further called.
If the method return TRUE, the other registeres IBACnetEventConsumer objects are not called anymore. The calling order is as
the objects were registered. All calls have to treat on their own, whether the EventIds are correct (see CmpBACnet.EVENTIDS) and/or
BACnet-Object-IDs or other additional data fits the needs of the registered FB (i.e. the specific BACnet-Object-FB).

rows.Name: EventId
rows.Comment:
If only one event is possibly called, the following Ids can be ignored. If there are more
at least the EventId should be checked, to get the right type of pParameter.ID of the occured Event. Contains the class and the event (see CmpBACnet.EVENTIDS)
